com.cloud.resources.popup

类 ConfirmPopup<V extends android.view.View>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloud.resources.popup.BasicPopup<android.view.View>
      • com.cloud.resources.popup.ConfirmPopup<V>
  • 类型参数:
    V - the type parameter
    所有已实现的接口:
    android.content.DialogInterface.OnKeyListener

    public abstract class ConfirmPopup<V extends android.view.View>
extends BasicPopup<android.view.View>
    带确定及取消按钮的弹窗

    2015/10/21
